title: What is JSX?
content: JSX is Javascript and HTML combined!

title: What is JSX continued...?
content: JSX is Javascript and HTML combined!

title: What is State in React?
content: In React, State is a built-in object that stores properties belonging to the component.

title: How to use State in React?
content: You can use state by either using class components or the usestate hook.

title: What are props?
content: You can use state by either using class components or the usestate hook.
